How can I post an item on the app?

To post an item, simply click the "+" button in the bottom menu. Then, fill in the details of your product. Once you\'ve entered all the information, press "Upload Item" and your item will be available for other users.
How can I contact the seller of an item?

If you find an item you\'re interested in, click the listing to view more details. There, you\'ll find a "Chat" button that allows you to send a direct message to the seller. Be sure to be clear and respectful in your message to get a quick response.
Can I delete a listing I no longer want to show?

Yes, you can delete your listing at any time. Go to your profile, click on the "Uploaded Products" section, and below your listings, you’ll find an option to "Delete". This will immediately remove the listing from the platform.
Can I negotiate the price of an item with the seller?

Yes, you can negotiate the price through the messaging system within the app. If the seller is willing to lower the price, you can agree on a new value. Remember to be polite and respectful during negotiations.
How can I make sure a listing is legitimate?

Always check the item details and photos before making a purchase. If you have doubts, feel free to contact the seller for more information. Additionally, review the ratings to get a better idea of the seller’s reputation.
